text: Meeting module in mobile has a big space underneath it that customer support can't help me out with. Does anyone have code or tips on how to remove it for mobile? Thank you!
do you have a preview link? or are you referring to the `<http://meetings.HubSpot.com/username|meetings.HubSpot.com/username>` url?
looks like the height is hard coded into the meetings embed code: <https://static.hsappstatic.net/MeetingsEmbed/ex/MeetingsEmbedCode.js>
you could override it with your own CSS
:point_up_2: unless you are using the meetings module where it only outputs the URL and you are doing the iframe yourself (at least thats what it did when i just did a preview)
though i would always recommend not using `!important`unless you really need to
<@U2H3TT8F2> I'm adding the meeting module in the page and selecting my meeting. So please clarify where I would add this code if I'm not doing the iframe myself?
Hey <@UM2TTF1CM>, if you want to DM me your ticket number, we can get this all sorted for you.

while you are looking, i noticed that the iframe screen changes when window is resized.  starts with the calendar view, then changes to a selected date and a best time, then to just a best time and when resized back to full, still has best time screen up
if you reload when in mobile (or when you have inspector looking like it mobile), it will show the selector. I noticed that too i think its just a issue when resizing
